name: The Museum Project
description:
Explore and survive a massive complex of structures installed on Earth by unknown means. Use the tools at your disposal as best you can to reach new heights and avoid an untimely demise. Navigate the environment, catalogue your findings, and stay connected to the people you left behind. What you discover could very well shape the future of our world.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Hold Left Shift to sprint
  • Press Space to jump
  • Use Left Mouse Button to shoot grapple hook
  • Use Right Mouse Button to retract grapple hook
  • Hold Q to use jetpack
  • Press Tab to toggle Construct Menu
  • Use left and right arrow keys to page through Construct Menu
  • Use up arrow key to select a Construct in the Construct Menu
  • Press E to place or destroy Constructs when looking at level ground near you

Made by the Museum Project Team. (Proper accreditation underway).
